body_content.explanation: in a way that shows that you are not able to see clearly things that are far away:
examples: He peered myopically into the shadows at the side of the stage.
She blinked myopically, trying to work out what was happening.

body_content.explanation: in a way that shows that you are unable to understand a situation or the way actions will affect it in the future:
examples: It's important not to focus too myopically on one side of the argument.
The party seems to be myopically focused on a single issue.
